job_purpose: To research, analyze, and optimize software needs within factory systems to enhance production efficiency and system performance.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Research and analyze software needs in factory systems
Evaluate current systems and recommend improvements for production efficiency
Test, debug, diagnose, and correct errors in production software
Write, maintain, and update software code to meet system requirements
Create and maintain technical documentation for clarity and usability
Provide guidance on software design proposals and upgrades for production systems
required_qualifications: Strong knowledge of system analysis, design, and testing methodologies
Proficiency in programming languages (e.g., Java, C++, Python)
Experience with software supporting factory operations or manufacturing systems
Ability to diagnose and resolve technical issues efficiently
Strong communication skills for documentation and support
Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field
company_details: Factory Systems Optimization Inc. specializes in enhancing production efficiency through software analysis and optimization. Our mission is to streamline manufacturing processes by leveraging cutting-edge technology solutions.
